idea: Precast concrete piles are extensively used all over the world, especially in the eastern Asian countries. Precast pile offers higher strength, uniform sections along the length, better resistance against water penetrations. Due to centrifugation compaction method, the spun piles are extremely durable and offer good resistance to corrosive atmospheric actions.
